pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Phenological Metrics using Presence-Only Data // Generates Weibull-parameterized estimates of phenology for any percentile of a distribution using the framework established in Cooke (1979) doi:10.1093/biomet/66.2.367.. Extensive testing against other estimators suggest the weib_percentile() function is especially useful in generating more accurate and less biased estimates of onset and offset. Non-parametric bootstrapping can be used to generate confidence intervals around those estimates. Additionally, this package offers an easy way to perform non-parametric bootstrapping to generate confidence intervals for quantile estimates, mean estimates, or any statistical function of interest.
